title: Anatomy Education Curriculum Using AI-Based Virtual Manipulative Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic biology and medical terminology
context.additional_context: Practical anatomy education course for in-service professionals, emphasizing interactive learning through VR/simulation environments and AI tools

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain 3D structures of over 20 human organs using AI-based virtual manipulation tools.
Learners can solve 10 practical anatomy-related problems using a ChatGPT-based Q&A system.
Learners achieve over 80% anatomical understanding by virtually manipulating five major surgical procedures in a simulation environment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
